Posts.Content: Having been told CHEMO is the ONLY treatment for TNBC. You may want a extra opinion on the radiation.
Posts.Title: Triple Negative IDC

Posts.Content: I agree.  Reconsider the chemo. The results willl not be good if you let it go. This type is aggressive and fast. I also had the Neulasta shot the next day. Ask for lidocane zidocane topical creams. Put on 1 hour before shot... Put a small piece of cellophane over it. Also ask RN to warm it bit she can. WORKS WONDERS FOR THE PAIN OF THAT STUFF!
Posts.Title: Triple Negative IDC

Posts.Content: I still have fatigue, neuropathy from chest wall down. I now have sharp pains in bones and hips..I. Now have lesions in my brain. Many many side effects 4 years out of chemo.
